body:
Comment 12: 
I found the source code for /usr/lib/dyld, which appears to be what is
crashing, and my copy of the /usr/lib/dyld binary appears to match
yours; at least, the trace you showed makes some sense interpreted
using my binary.

Could you please attach the broken gofmt binary and also the
/usr/lib/dyld from your crashing system to this issue?

Thanks.
Russ
